author: maxb
msg: Merge r22486 from trunk to 1.4.x branch.
davautocheck.sh: Remove bash-ism to fix Bourne shell portability.

author: ehu
msg: Followup to r22542: fix non-win32, non-cygwin builds.

author: ehu
msg: Note: This commit removes the remainder of the Neon 0.23 shim code,
but also fixes a bug which crept in on the other shim-removal commits:
the SVN_RA_DAV__XML_* constants were not compatible with the new
SVN_RA_DAV__XML_INVALID): Renumber so we can return them
(validate_element): Remove unused parameter now that it's not used
svn_ra_dav__get_props): Adjust for new parser interface.
end_err_element): The return values of the interfaces these functions
implement are not defined in NE_XML_* terms, but 0/non-0 instead. So,
don't use NE_XML_* (or their SVN_RA_DAV__XML_* equivalents).
(wrapper_start_element): Set an error on malformed XML.

author: lgo
msg: Fix some path functions to support windows and UNC paths (again), both on
(svn_path_dirname): don't try to split a root path in segments. Add support
(svn_path_basename): fix to support Windows paths on Cywgin.
(svn_path_is_child): fix some special cases involving UNC paths. Add support
svn_path_canonicalize): fix to support Windows paths on Cywgin.
(test_funcs): mark test_path_is_child, test_path_split and test_dirname as
